Meta.title: Better Storage Chest
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod提供了一个BepInEX配置文件 sosarciel.betterstoragechest.cfg 允许你设置: 收纳箱扳手升级效果乘数(允许小数) 收纳箱电量消耗乘数(允许小数) 允许在帐篷内打开收纳箱 开启基于字典的合并算法, 优化物品合并性能(原版游戏在单容器包含2000物品之后, 合并算法的时间开销几乎大于1秒, 想要继续使用是几乎不可能的) 允许为收纳箱贴上售卖标签
注意, 所有选项默认都不启用 你需要手动在游戏安装目录的BepInEX配置(如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.betterstoragechest.cfg") 内更改配置使其生效
This mod provides a BepInEX configuration file sosarciel.betterstoragechest.cfg that allows you to configure: Wrench upgrade effect multiplier for storage chests (supports decimals) Energy consumption multiplier for storage chests (supports decimals) Allows opening storage chest in the tent Enable dictionary-based merge algorithm, optimizing item merge performance (in the original game, the merge algorithm's time cost becomes almost greater than 1 second when a single container holds more than 2000 items, making it nearly impossible to continue using it) Allows tagging storage chests for sale
Note: All options are disabled by default. You need to manually change the configuration in the BepInEX config directory within your game installation folder (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.betterstoragechest.cfg") for them to take effect.
